15.text: Tomorrow is here. I'm looking forward to it.

1004.text: My thanks to all of you.

1133.text: Even if it's destined to shatter―

2033.text: Nothing to worry about. Please wait for my return at the winner's circle.

2034.text: If you know your enemy and know yourself, you will never be defeated in a hundred battles. You must reexamine yourselves and your opponent… now.

10000.text: All for the sake of "now" - the brilliance of this moment. Let's engrave the determination that you and I have put into this trail.

10001.text: Would you like to stop by after practice? I was at a cafe yesterday with a friend… I wish we could share that moment together.

10002.text: Your shoulders are so warm. With that perch, I feel like I can fly anywhere.

10003.text: Oh, I have ink on my fingers… fufu, Actually, Yaeno and I had the first calligraphy session together… I'm a little sad to wash it off.

10004.text: Trainer, um… would you mind going out with me? …For practice, handing friendship chocolates….

10005.text: I have prepared for you some homemade sweets that are my grandmother's specialties. I wanted you to know that warm taste.

10006.text: Only one day in a year. A momentary meeting between Orihime and Hikoboshi. Strong feelings can brilliance even for a moment.

10007.text: Can't we give out candy to real ghosts too? Their passion, their will… I would love to hear what they have to say.

10008.text: Santa Claus from the dormitory is coming to our room tonight. What kind of tea should we prepare?

10009.text: Why don't you come and see the tree with me? The glass star will shine brightly in the sky, it must be really beautiful.

10010.text: I look forward to seeing everyone's New Year's greeting cards every year. I also have to express my gratitude for the year… one by one, carefully.

10011.text: Happy Birthday and best wishes to you and your family. Sleep is the basis of health… I will give you Pillow recommendation later.

10012.text: Let's head over to the Mejiro house. We've put a lot of effort into preparing for your birthday party♪

10013.text: Chiyono o has been so restless since this morning… Hehe ♪… this is one of the joys of birthdays, isn't it?

10014.text: Would you like to take a detour today? Since it's my birthday, I'd like to ask you to escort me♪

10015.text: Oh, I think there is an announcement. It may be urgent news, so why don't you take a look at it?

10016.text: You have received a present. Fufu… It's also nice to spend some time thinking about what's inside.

10017.text: Congratulations on accomplishing the mission. This small accumulation will be the foundation for a great achievement.

10018.text: I see that the event will be starting soon. I wish I could help with preparations.

10019.text: Would you like to take a peek at the event? Limited time… In other words, something you can only enjoy now, so we can't miss it♪

10021.text: It seems that the level of Umamusume Directory has increased.

20000.text: …a little unstable, but… no problem. I'm used to this kind of thing.

20001.text: I must not be weak… I have to endure.

20002.text: I don't know why, but I feel like I can run anywhere now. …No, I want to run. Beyond the limit…!

20003.text: Every minute, every second, every moment… I feel that I am able to focus on the details. If this is the case, I'm sure…

20004.text: One, two, three… phew. Temperature, heart rate, and muscles are all good. What shall we do today?

20005.text: Legs are in great shape. I can train as hard as I can… That alone is unbearably exhilarating.

20006.text: "As usual" day, was the best I could do… but now I have to aim higher.

20007.text: Let's cherish every moment… Let's keep in mind to train carefully.

20008.text: My steps are heavy… but I can't afford to give up at this level. Believe in the training you have been accumulating…

20009.text: Well… there are days like this, aren't there? First of all, take your time… why don't you have a cup of tea and relax?

20010.text: Trainer-san… today I think we need to take a comprehensive look… I wonder if it's necessary to revise the training menu…

20011.text: I wonder if I will be able to leave a living trace of my life as I am now. No, I must not rush. Take a deep breath… calm down, take a deep breath…

20021.text: Haste makes waste. …Is this really the time to be reckless?

20022.text: There is a difference between preparedness and recklessness. What will we gain by pushing ourselves any further?

20023.text: Just moving forward, forward. Everything I do is for that.

20024.text: Please take a look. My best run, my best brilliance…

20025.text: If you know your enemy and know yourself, you will never be defeated in a hundred battles. You must reexamine yourselves and your opponent… now.

20026.text: Long study, long training. All of them are for this moment.

20027.text: This exhilaration… I wonder if the greats of the past felt the same way.

20028.text: Nothing to worry about. Please wait for my return at the winner's circle.

20029.text: All that remains is to do my best as usual. I will show you who I am now.

20030.text: No negative factors… Phew, that's alone more than enough for me.

20031.text: Carefully, one at a time. Believe in the fruits of our past efforts. …I will go.

20032.text: Focus… focus… It's okay, this level of discomfort… is something I've been through many times.

20033.text: There is no perfect time. That's racing. Let's overcome this wall… together.

20034.text: If it is in times of adversity that a person's true nature is revealed, then [now] is the time to show this resolve.

20035.text: I will not whine. I will do what I can do now, carefully, one thing at a time…

20036.text: Be brave, be daring. We will overcome this adversity.

20037.text: This is not the place to end it. In order to leave proof of our life… we can't let this end…!

20051.text: Would you like to join us?

30000.text: One more step, just ahead… the brilliance we're aiming for!

30001.text: Next time, we'll do better than this…!

30002.text: The result is called a good fight, but I am not satisfied…

30003.text: …I have to train again from scratch.

30004.text: I engrave one proof of my life here.

30005.text: The brilliance of the glass illuminated my path.

30007.text: The brilliance of the glass illuminated my path.

40000.text: Wings of glass, let them shine!

40001.text: Ephemeral body of glass, soar high into the sky. For your body shines brighter than anyone else!

60000.text: We express our gratitude to all of you in our songs.

60001.text: I will show you, My brilliance on the stage.

70000.text: The best of the moment, together…

70001.text: You have found a radiance in me. I am now very proud of that encounter.

70004.text: I feel the history of the school… it makes me tense.

70008.text: I can move my legs easily… I think I can dance the best.

70010.text: Let's straighten up our appearance and stand up straight.

70014.text: The costume I dreamed of… I'll make it stand out in all its splendor.

70015.text: The contrast between black and white. To make the brilliance stand out even more…

70019.text: This costume will make me shine brighter.

71004.text: I feel the history of the school… it makes me tense.

71008.text: I can move my legs easily… I think I can dance the best.

71010.text: Let's straighten up our appearance and stand up straight.

71014.text: The costume I dreamed of… I'll make it stand out in all its splendor.

71015.text: The contrast between black and white. To make the brilliance stand out even more…

71019.text: This costume will make me shine brighter.

90000.text: Good morning. If you add honey to the morning tea, it's a pleasant way to start the day.

90001.text: Oh, you still look a little sleepy. If you need it, may I offer you a spritz of awakening aroma?

90002.text: During lunch break, I had tea with the infirmary doctor. Since I'm a regular visitor, I have to express my gratitude on a regular basis.

90003.text: Huddling with friends, steamy food… the cafeteria at lunchtime is always an exciting place to be, no matter how many times you visit.

90004.text: Trainer, pushing yourself… is no-no ! How about this? This is a countermeasure to prevent staying up late at night directly from Creek-san.

90005.text: On a quiet night like this, I feel like going for a walk. Since there is no sun, I think I can stretch my wings a little more… Would you like to join me?

90006.text: The profiles of the new students are all shining with dreams. Fufu… I can't help but squint.

90007.text: I just met a Palmer with a bouquet of sunflowers… her smile was just like a sunflower♪

90008.text: I know I shouldn't stay up late, but… I just want to blame it on the season and flip through the pages.

90009.text: Potage for breakfast reminded me of the taste of my grandma's homemade warm soup… on a cold day…

91000.text: The other day, I found a picture of my sister when she was a little girl. She looked dignified, beautiful and dazzling despite her young age.

91001.text: Did you know? Tamamo-san's bargaining and negotiation skills… the glimpse of righteousness person. It was like watching rakugo.

91002.text: The sound of breaking glass… why is it so peculiar? That high-pitched sound… I just can't get used to it.

91003.text: I just heard some happy news from Helios. She said "A new boba store opened weiii★". Fufu, my detour routes are increasing ♪

91004.text: Actually, I'm not sure what to give as a thank-you gift to the Mejiro doctor … should I get a work tool… Maybe a needle?

91005.text: The belly button revealing clothes are fresh. Gorgeous costumes and intense dancing… Hehe, even my heart is dancing.

91006.text: That costume I dreamed of in my hospital room, now… I am wearing it like this. …I wish I could show it to the me of that day.

91007.text: The brooch on my chest is based on a necklace my father gave me… When I put my hand on it, I feel at peace.

91008.text: Elegant… the burden on the body was also calculated… the very best of race outfit. I must show my gratitude by winning.

91009.text: Every morning, when I shake Chiyono to wake her up, it is another happy moment for me.

91010.text: I am always amazed at the way Oguri-san eat. Thanks to her, I too, eat more and more.

91011.text: I had an evening tea party with Tachyon-san, and the tea was glowing… Fuf, what an amazing experience♪

91012.text: When I told them that the yaezakura trees are beautiful…… Fufu, my two schoolmates' cheeks turned pink.

91013.text: If you like, why don't we go on our next holiday to the summer resort of Mejiro? There is nothing like reading a book by the lake there.

91014.text: Even though the autumn leaves is short, we celebrate the moment with a burning sensation. …It is a beauty that makes you fall in love with it.

91015.text: Fufu. Every time winter comes, I remember. I was encouraged to put on layer upon layer of clothing… and they called me a Mejiro snowman♪

92000.text: These legs called [glass] will not shatter so easily. Please accept this resolve.

92001.text: Stretching is slow and careful. This accumulation is also my weapon.

92002.text: With my feet, I tread the earth. With my legs, I run. That alone is enough to make my heart beat.

92003.text: Cherish this moment. Concentrate on every second and make this day the best it can be.

92005.text: Thank you for your daily menus that take into account my workloads. I will respond with results. I promise.

92006.text: I am beginning to see a little of the [brilliance] within me. This radiance will surely illuminate our present.

92007.text: The road we walked together is now my pride. What lies ahead of us from moment by moment, surely is…

92011.text: It's the perfect environment for efficient training. This summer, let's shine hotter than the sun.

93000.text: I dedicate this most precious brilliance to you.

93001.text: The glass legs brought us happiness.

95000.text: We will not retreat. We are still moving forward.

95001.text: The brilliance of this moment… even stronger…!

95004.text: This [now]. For this moment of brilliance―!

95005.text: I hope I can be of further assistance.

95006.text: I never knew I had such power…

110000.text: What kind of training should we do?

110001.text: Let's look back at history together.

140005.text: Thank you for your hard work.

400005.text: I have not had a lot of experience working with people like this on a single challenge, so… it's a lot of work, but it's a lot of fun.

400011.text: Chiyono O. sent me a picture of me at the ceremony… Hehe, it's a little embarrassing.

400012.text: The event mission is here, so let's make the most of each and every day.

400013.text: Have you forgotten anything? Let's make sure we don't miss anything and connect it to the future.
